traits.name: Acid Bomb
traits.desc: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) acid damage.

traits.name: Disolver Tanglefoot
traits.desc: The vial explodes into a 5-foot-radius point in the thrower's sight. The area becomes difficult terrain until the end of the encounter. Each creature in the area must make a DC 10 Dexterity, becoming restrained on a failed saving throw and taking ongoing 2 (1d4) acid damage. They can use their action to make a DC 10 Strength check to break free and stop the ongoing.
